question_name.description: The name of the question in Prairie Learn

question_path.description: The path to the zip file this question appears in

comment.description: A comment attached to this report generated by MOSS

number_of_matches_to_show.description: The number of matches to show in the report generated

language.description: The language the problem is in

max_appearances.description: The maximum number of times a code segment can appear before it is ignored. If a code segment appears many times it is likely to be the result of legitimate sharing

submitted_files.description: A list of glob patterns matching the names of the files the students submitted

base_files.description: List of one or more glob patterns specifying paths to files on this computer that contain base files. Base files are those that were provided to the student
